column4: text: "Voyager 2 launched from Kennedy Space Flight Center"}
text: "Voyager 1 launched from Kennedy Space Flight Center. Voyager 1 returns first spacecraft photo of Earth and Moon"}
text: "Voyager 1 makes its closest approach to Jupiter"}
text: "Voyager 2 makes its closest approach to Jupiter"}
text: "Voyager 1 flies by Saturn. Voyager 1 begins its trip out of the Solar System"}

column2: text: "Deep Space Network upgrades two 26-m antennas to 34-m"}

column4: text: "Voyager 2 has the first-ever encounter with Uranus. Deep Space Network begins expansion of 64-m antennas to 70-m"}

column2: text: "Voyager 2 returns first color images of Neptune"}

column4: text: "Voyager 2 is the first spacecraft to observe Neptune. Voyager 2 begins its trip out of the Solar System below the ecliptic plane"}
text: "Last Voyager Images - Portrait of the Solar System"}
text: "Voyager 1 passes Pioneer 10 to become the most distant human-made object in space"}
